Name Vidor Player
com.vindormusic.splayer
Music/Entertainment

Free synthesizer for Vindor ES1 electronic saxophone. This is not the control app.

The Vindor ES1 electronic saxophone includes numerous built-in sounds. This app is a free synthesizer that provides additional MIDI-compatible instruments.

* Process MIDI messages from any device
* Supports Breath Controller messages
* Suppors HiRes messages
* 128 sampled instruments

Note: This is not the control app for the ES1. If you wish to customize the settings and built-in sounds, search for Vindor Control.

Synth, MIDI, Synthesizer, Vindor

http://vindormusic.com/support
